thread.section_title: The Standard, High Line - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing hotel!!
thread.title_full: Amazing hotel!! - Review of The Standard, High Line, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Katet23101
title: Amazing hotel!!
text: From the view to the modern interiors, this hotel was one of the best I have been to. Granted due to the higher price my boyfriend and I just stayed here for one night using their special one night promo app. In any case, the location is perfect, just walking distance from the Chelsea Market and literally on top of the high line walk. I highly recommend this hotel!
